languages.text: {n}Адальберт внимательно изучает воспаленные пузыри на вашей коже.{/n} "Болезнь нечистых, Ваша Светлость. Тех, кто забыл свет Его и отверг всякую заботу не только о собственном теле, но и о духе. Позвольте помочь вам очистить плоть бренную от семян скверны санационной молитвою".

{n}Adalbert carefully studies the inflamed blisters on your skin.{/n} "An affliction of the unclean, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of the body as well as the spirit. Allow me to cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."
languages.original_text: {n}Адальберт внимательно изучает воспаленные пузыри на вашей коже.{/n} "Болезнь нечистых, Ваша Светлость. Тех, кто забыл свет Его и отверг всякую заботу не только о собственном теле, но и о духе. Позвольте помочь вам очистить плоть бренную от семян скверны санационной молитвою".

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert carefully studies the inflamed blisters on your skin.{/n} "An affliction of the unclean, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of not only their body but their spirit as well. Allow me to help you cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."

Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of the body as well as the spirit. Allow me to cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert examina detenidamente las ampollas de tu piel.{/n} «Una aflicción de los impuros, mi{mf|lord|lady}. De quienes han abandonado Su luz y abandonado todos los cuidados corporales, además de los espirituales. Permita que purgue las semillas de la corrupción de su cuerpo mortal con una oración sanadora».
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert carefully studies the inflamed blisters on your skin.{/n} "An affliction of the unclean, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of the body as well as the spirit. Allow me to cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert examina detenidamente las ampollas de tu piel.{/n} «Una aflicción de los impuros, mi{mf|lord|lady}. De quienes han abandonado Su luz y abandonado todos los cuidados corporales, además de los espirituales. Permita que purgue las semillas de la corrupción de su cuerpo mortal con una oración sanadora».

languages.text: {n}アダルバートトはあなたの皮膚の炎症を注意深く観察している。{/n} 「穢れた者の苦悩です、陛下。主の光を捨て、精神だけでなく肉体のケアも放棄した者たちです。あなたの死すべき肉から堕落の種を浄化させてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert carefully studies the inflamed blisters on your skin.{/n} "An affliction of the unclean, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of the body as well as the spirit. Allow me to cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートトはあなたの皮膚の炎症を注意深く観察している。{/n} 「穢れた者の苦悩です、陛下。主の光を捨て、精神だけでなく肉体のケアも放棄した者たちです。あなたの死すべき肉から堕落の種を浄化させてください」

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特仔细研究着你皮肤上发炎的水泡。{/n}“这是不洁之人患上的传染病，大人。那些抛弃了祂的明光、不肯照顾自己的身体与精神的人，便会患上这样的疾病。请允许我通过净化祈祷，将腐化的种子从您的肉体上彻底驱逐。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert carefully studies the inflamed blisters on your skin.{/n} "An affliction of the unclean, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of the body as well as the spirit. Allow me to cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特仔细研究着你皮肤上发炎的水泡。{/n}“这是不洁之人患上的传染病，大人。那些抛弃了祂的明光、不肯照顾自己的身体与精神的人，便会患上这样的疾病。请允许我通过净化祈祷，将腐化的种子从您的肉体上彻底驱逐。”

languages.text: {n}Adalbert untersucht sorgfältig die entzündeten Blasen auf deiner Haut.{/n} "Eine Krankheit der Unreinen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Derer, die Sein Licht verlassen und jede Pflege von Körper und Geist vernachlässigt haben. Erlaubt mir, Euer sterbliches Fleisch mit einem heilenden Gebet von der Saat der Verderbnis zu reinigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert carefully studies the inflamed blisters on your skin.{/n} "An affliction of the unclean, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of the body as well as the spirit. Allow me to cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert untersucht sorgfältig die entzündeten Blasen auf deiner Haut.{/n} "Eine Krankheit der Unreinen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Derer, die Sein Licht verlassen und jede Pflege von Körper und Geist vernachlässigt haben. Erlaubt mir, Euer sterbliches Fleisch mit einem heilenden Gebet von der Saat der Verderbnis zu reinigen."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert examine attentivement les cloques inflammatoires sur votre peau.{/n} « Une affliction typique des êtres impurs, Votre Seigneurie. Ceux qui ont tourné le dos à Sa lumière et renoncé à prendre soin de leur corps comme de leur esprit. Permettez que je purifie votre chair mortelle des germes de la corruption au moyen d'une prière curative. »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert carefully studies the inflamed blisters on your skin.{/n} "An affliction of the unclean, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of the body as well as the spirit. Allow me to cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert examine attentivement les cloques inflammatoires sur votre peau.{/n} « Une affliction typique des êtres impurs, Votre Seigneurie. Ceux qui ont tourné le dos à Sa lumière et renoncé à prendre soin de leur corps comme de leur esprit. Permettez que je purifie votre chair mortelle des germes de la corruption au moyen d'une prière curative. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert tenindeki şişmiş kabarcıkları dikkatle inceliyor.{/n} "Kirlenmiş hastalığıdır {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. O'nun ışığından yüz çevirenlerin ve ruhları gibi bedenlerine de bakmaktan vazgeçenlerin. İzninizle ölümlü bedeninizi şifalı bir duayla bu yozlaşmışlık tohumlarından temizleyeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert carefully studies the inflamed blisters on your skin.{/n} "An affliction of the unclean, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Those who have abandoned His light and shunned all care of the body as well as the spirit. Allow me to cleanse your mortal flesh of the seeds of corruption with a sanative prayer."
